mapper.select: SELECT sdv.* FROM sku_declared_value sdv INNER JOIN (SELECT sku_id, MAX(effective_date) max_date FROM sku_declared_value sdv GROUP BY sku_id) sdv2 ON sdv.sku_id = sdv2.sku_id AND sdv.effective_date = sdv2.max_date JOIN sku s ON sdv.sku_id = s.id
SELECT sdv.declared_value FROM sku_declared_value sdv JOIN sku s ON sdv.sku_id = s.id WHERE sku_id = #{skuId} AND effective_date <= #{date} ORDER BY effective_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT erp_code, sdv.declared_value FROM sku_declared_value sdv INNER JOIN (SELECT sku_id, MAX(effective_date) max_date FROM sku_declared_value sdv GROUP BY sku_id) sdv2 ON sdv.sku_id = sdv2.sku_id AND sdv.effective_date = sdv2.max_date JOIN sku s ON sdv.sku_id = s.id
